tags.name: ef-heatmap
tags.description:
A graphical representation of data where the individual
values contained in a matrix are represented as colors

attributes.name: label-width
attributes.description:
Number of maximum label width that cell can paint in pixel.
e.g. label-width: 30px; cell label hides when text length reaches 30px.

attributes.name: label-hidden
attributes.description: Hide all labels in the cells

attributes.name: min-point
attributes.description: Minimum point of the cell coloring

attributes.name: mid-point
attributes.description: Middle point of the cell coloring

attributes.name: max-point
attributes.description: Maximum point of the cell coloring

attributes.name: saturation
attributes.description: Cell minimum color saturation, value can be from 0 - 1

properties.name: labelWidth
properties.description:
Number of maximum label width that cell can paint in pixel.
e.g. label-width: 30px; cell label hides when text length reaches 30px.

properties.name: labelHidden
properties.description: Hide all labels in the cells

properties.name: minPoint
properties.description: Minimum point of the cell coloring

properties.name: midPoint
properties.description: Middle point of the cell coloring

properties.name: maxPoint
properties.description: Maximum point of the cell coloring

properties.name: saturation
properties.description: Cell minimum color saturation, value can be from 0 - 1

properties.name: tooltipCallback
properties.description: A callback function that allows tooltip rendering on cell hover

properties.name: renderCallback
properties.description:
Render callback function use for custom cell properties.
Accepts custom label, foreground and background color
